title: Handcrafted
description: Beautiful, one-of-a-kind quilts made with love and attention to detail. Each quilt tells a story through its patterns and fabrics.

title: Custom Embroidery
description: Personalized embroidery for special occasions. Add names, dates, or custom designs to make your textiles truly unique.

title: Decorative Pillows
description: Accent pillows that add comfort and style to any space. Available in various fabrics, patterns, and sizes to match your decor.
